text: Tasartha (he muham'mada!) Usaitarpha manisaharula'i bola'irahanus ra je tapa'ila'i adesa bha'eko cha, tyasaima drdhatako satha sthira rahanus, ra uniharuko iccha anurupa nahidnus ra bhanidinus ki ‘‘jati kitaba allahale avatarita garyo, mero tinamathi imana cha ra mala'i adesa cha ki timima insapha garum . Allaha nai hamro ra timro, palanakarta ho. Hamila'i hamra, ra timra karmaharu timralagi nai hun! Hami ra timima kunai jhai–jhagada chaina. Allahale hami sabaila'i ekatrita garnecha, ra usaitira pharkera januparnecha.’’
